title: Authors and Citation
text: Aleš Vomáčka. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Vomáčka (2025). avom: Personal helpers Aleš Vomáčka. R package version 0.3.1, https://alesvomacka.github.io/avom/, https://github.com/alesvomacka/avom.
code: @Manual{,   title = {avom: Personal helpers for Aleš Vomáčka},   author = {Aleš Vomáčka},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.3.1,     https://alesvomacka.github.io/avom/},   url = {https://github.com/alesvomacka/avom}, }

title: Personal helpers for Aleš Vomáčka
text: personal package functions data analysis visualization.

title: Personal helpers for Aleš Vomáčka
text: can install development version avom GitHub : ggplot2 theme uses Fira Sans font.
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("alesvomacka/avom")

title: avom S7 palette class — avom_colors
text: Creates color palette, S7 object class "avom_palette", used functions.

title: avom S7 palette class — avom_colors
code: avom_colors(name = character(0), type = character(0), colors = logical(0))

title: avom S7 palette class — avom_colors
text: name Name class, "avom_palette". type Type palette: "nominal", "diverging" "sequential". colors Vector colors.

title: avom S7 palette class — avom_colors
text: S7 object class "avom_palette".

title: avom S7 palette class — avom_colors
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ avom_colors(name = "gruvbox", type = "nominal", colors = c("#cc241d", "#98971a", "#458588", "#d79921", "#b16286", "#d65d0e", "#689d6a")) } # }

title: Quickly set geoms defaults — avom_ggplot2_defaults
text: Sets color font family common geoms.

title: Quickly set geoms defaults — avom_ggplot2_defaults
code: avom_ggplot2_defaults(   def_color = "#83a598",   font_family = "Fira Sans",   font_color = "#282828" )

title: Quickly set geoms defaults — avom_ggplot2_defaults
text: def_color Default color columns, points, lines, etc. font_family Default font family text. font_color Default font color text.

title: Quickly set geoms defaults — avom_ggplot2_defaults
code: avom_ggplot2_defaults()

title: Convenient wrapper around ggsave — avom_ggsave
text: simple wrapper around ggplot2::ggsave(), uses metric unit system AGG graphical device default.

title: Convenient wrapper around ggsave — avom_ggsave
code: avom_ggsave(   filename,   plot = ggplot2::last_plot(),   width = 17,   height = 8,   scaling = 1,   device = ragg::agg_png,   ... )

title: Convenient wrapper around ggsave — avom_ggsave
text: filename Name exported file. plot Exported plot width Width plot. Defaults 17 cm. height Height plot. Defaults 8 cm. scaling Scaling factor text. Defaults 1. device Graphical device use. Defaults ragg::agg_png(). ... arguments passed ggplot2::ggsave().

title: Convenient wrapper around ggsave — avom_ggsave
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ mtcars_plot <- ggplot2::ggplot(mtcars,                 mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = mpg,                                        y = hp)) + ggplot2::geom_point()  avom_ggsave("mtcars-plot.png", mtcars_plot) } # }

title: Color Palettes for avom — avom_palette
text: Palettes plotting.

title: Color Palettes for avom — avom_palette
code: avom_palette(palette = "catpuccin_latte")

title: Color Palettes for avom — avom_palette
text: palette Name palette.

title: Color Palettes for avom — avom_palette
text: S7 object class "avom_palette".

title: Color Palettes for avom — avom_palette
text: Returns S7 object representing color palette. existing palettes : Nominal: catpuccin_latte, catpuccin_frappe, catpuccin_macchiato, catpuccing_mocha, gruvbox, gruvbox_light Diverging: beach, royal_orange Sequential: rising_reds, rising_blues

title: Color Palettes for avom — avom_palette
code: avom_palette(palette = "catpuccin_latte") #> <avom::avom_palette> #>  @ name  : chr "catpuccin_latte" #>  @ type  : chr "nominal" #>  @ colors: chr [1:6] "#d20f39" "#40a02b" "#1e66f5" "#fe640b" "#209fb5" "#ea76cb"

what: Count and Compute Relative Frequencies — count_pct
title: Count and Compute Relative Frequencies — count_pct
text: like dplyr::count() also computes relative frequencies.

title: Count and Compute Relative Frequencies — count_pct
code: count_pct(data, ..., wt = NULL, .by = NULL, labels = FALSE, suffix = "")

title: Count and Compute Relative Frequencies — count_pct
text: data Dataset ... Additional arguments passed dplyr::count(), including variables. wt Optional weights .Optional variable compute grouped percentages labels TRUE, returns values formatted plotting` suffix Set suffix labels

title: Count and Compute Relative Frequencies — count_pct
text: Dataframe absolute relative frequencies.

title: Count and Compute Relative Frequencies — count_pct
text: Uses dplyr::count() compute absolute, possibly weighted, frequencies. Also computes relative frequencies possibly labels plots.

title: Count and Compute Relative Frequencies — count_pct
code: count_pct(mtcars, cyl, labels = TRUE) #>   cyl  n percent label #> 1   4 11 0.34375    34 #> 2   6  7 0.21875    22 #> 3   8 14 0.43750    44

title: Color Palette Generator — palette_gen
text: Helper function generate ggplot2 color palettes.

title: Color Palette Generator — palette_gen
code: palette_gen(palette = "catpuccin_latte", direction = 1)

title: Color Palette Generator — palette_gen
text: palette Name palette. direction Order colors. Set -1 reverse order

title: Color Palette Generator — palette_gen
text: Function used scale_colour_avom() scale_fill_avom().

title: Color Palette Generator — palette_gen
code: palette_gen(palette = "catpuccin_latte", direction = 1) #> function (n)  #> { #>     if (n > length(avom_palette(palette)@colors))  #>         warning("Not enough colors in this palette!") #>     else { #>         all_colors <- avom_palette(palette)@colors #>         colors_type = avom_palette(palette)@type #>         if (colors_type == "diverging") { #>             all_colors = select_diverging(all_colors, n) #>         } #>         all_colors <- if (direction >= 0)  #>             all_colors #>         else rev(all_colors) #>         color_list <- all_colors[1:n] #>     } #> } #> <bytecode: 0x55ee8e9eee68> #> <environment: 0x55ee8e9f18b0>

what: Scale Color Palette for ggplot2 — scale_colour_avom
title: Scale Color Palette for ggplot2 — scale_colour_avom
text: Set color palette ggplot2 color fill scales.

title: Scale Color Palette for ggplot2 — scale_colour_avom
code: scale_colour_avom(palette = "catpuccin_latte", direction = 1, ...)  scale_fill_avom(palette = "catpuccin_latte", direction = 1, ...)  scale_color_avom(palette = "catpuccin_latte", direction = 1, ...)

title: Scale Color Palette for ggplot2 — scale_colour_avom
text: palette Name palette. direction Order colors. Set -1 reverse order ... arguments passed ggplot2::discrete_scale().

title: Scale Color Palette for ggplot2 — scale_colour_avom
text: Function used together ggplot2::ggplot().

title: Scale Color Palette for ggplot2 — scale_colour_avom
code: ggplot2::ggplot(data = mtcars,                 mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = mpg, y = hp, color = as.factor(cyl))) +          ggplot2::geom_point() +          avom::scale_colour_avom("catpuccin_latte")

what: Select Colors from Diverging Palettes — select_diverging
title: Select Colors from Diverging Palettes — select_diverging
text: Helper function select colors diverging palettes correct order.

title: Select Colors from Diverging Palettes — select_diverging
code: select_diverging(palette, n)

title: Select Colors from Diverging Palettes — select_diverging
text: palette Name palette. n Number colors select.

title: Select Colors from Diverging Palettes — select_diverging
text: Vector colors.

title: Select Colors from Diverging Palettes — select_diverging
Setup up Project Structure — setup_project
text: Sets project structure.

title: Setup up Project Structure — setup_project
code: setup_project(air = TRUE, pak = TRUE)

title: Setup up Project Structure — setup_project
text: air Sets air.toml Air formatter pak Installs pak (sets work renv present)

title: Setup up Project Structure — setup_project
text: Nothing

title: Setup up Project Structure — setup_project
text: Creates folders usually use. Optionally also sets air pak.

title: Setup up Project Structure — setup_project
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ setup_project() } # }

title: ggplot2 theme from avom — theme_avom
text: ggplot2 theme based gruvbox color palette Fira Sans font.

title: ggplot2 theme from avom — theme_avom
code: theme_avom(   font_family = "Fira Sans",   font_size = 10,   font_color = "#282828",   backround_color = "#faf7eb",   gridlines_color = "#cfcbc6",   ... )

title: ggplot2 theme from avom — theme_avom
text: font_family Font family. Defaults "Fira Sans". font_size Baseline size text. Defaults 10. font_color Font color. Defaults "#282828". backround_color Backround color. Defaults "#fbf1c7". gridlines_color Color gridlines. Defaults "#d1c8c0". ... arguments passed ggplot2::theme_minimal().

title: ggplot2 theme from avom — theme_avom
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ ggplot2::ggplot(data = mtcars,                 mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = mpg, y = hp)) +          ggplot2::geom_point() +          theme_avom()          } # }

title: avom 0.2.1
text: Switched plot.caption ggtext::element_markdown() ggtext::element_textbox_simple().

title: avom 0.2
text: Updated theme_avom() respect text hierarchy. New function avom_ggplot2_defaults() quickly set geom properties. New function avom_ggsave() convenient plot exporting.

title: avom 0.1
text: Added color palettes based gruvbox (scale_color_avom() scale_fill_avom()) Added ggplot2 based gruvbox (theme_avom())
